Name: Divyansh Pandya

Review: Campus life is that one thing to which everyone will get attracted to it. Like campus life is an experience that stays with you. Wonderful campus life has exciting events like Garbautsav, Youth Fest, Annual Day, Intercollege sports events etc. In general, the events start from Feb till Sept. The college has one of the biggest libraries in the town with lots of Tech books and journals. The classrooms have smart boards so that understanding concepts is becoming easy.
